content:
"We find the thoughtful feedback in this community to be absolutely essential to making a great product; so many good ideas, constraints on designs, and wording/documentation improvements are generated by conversations with folks like you stopping by to chat."

--Tim Abbott, founder of Zulip, at https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/137-feedback/topic/it's.20awesome.20that.20the.20core.20team.20is.20so.20active.20here/near/1939571
